headline: Should Investors Reassess S&P Global After Strong 2024 Performance and Recent Flat Trend?
summary: If you are wondering what to do with S&P Global stock, you are not alone. This company sits at the crossroads of finance and intelligence, and its share price is never far from the spotlight. After climbing more than 65% in the last five years, S&P Global has kept momentum in 2024 with a year-to-date gain of 10.7%. That kind of long-term resilience can tempt even the most cautious investor. However, short-term moves are telling a different story, with the stock dipping 1.5% in the past week...
